name: Playbook for Exploited Command and Scripting Interpreter
description: This playbook mitigates the effects of a vulnerability exploited in a web application, where the attacker executed arbitrary commands, exfiltrated sensitive data, and deployed additional payloads.

action--b89f7884-7eb6-4a97-8879-30850f04.name: Kill malicious process
action--b89f7884-7eb6-4a97-8879-30850f04.description: Terminate any malicious processes identified after the compromise.

if-condition--bdd8f392-de8d-4a4a-b5a8-5a.name: Check if compromised host needs isolation

action--bdd8f392-de8d-4a4a-b5a8-5ac1f015.name: Isolate affected host from network
action--bdd8f392-de8d-4a4a-b5a8-5ac1f015.description: Block access to and from the compromised host to prevent further damage.

action--b7e237d1-c2bf-42ce-8979-d55ea9a1.name: Run antivirus scan
action--b7e237d1-c2bf-42ce-8979-d55ea9a1.description: Perform a thorough scan on the system to detect and remove malicious files.

while-condition--d28148d4-8137-46cc-8600.name: Repeat until scan is clean
while-condition--d28148d4-8137-46cc-8600.description: Repeat the antivirus scan until no threats are found.
